import { FieldCheckboxGroup } from '@looker/components'
import { Editor, excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'
import storyInline from '!!raw-loader!./Inline'

<Meta component={FieldCheckboxGroup} title="Docs/FieldCheckboxGroup" />


# FieldCheckboxGroup

Groups of checkboxes can be displayed with `FieldCheckboxGroup`.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

There are two "inline" variations:

- The `inline` prop will put the group label and all the inputs in one line (wrapping the inputs as necessary)
- The `inputsInline` prop will stack the group label on top but keep all the inputs inline

<Editor code={storyInline} />


## Props

<ArgsTable of={FieldCheckboxGroup} exclude={excludedProps} />
